name: Coolors
description:
Coolors is the super fast color palettes generator loved by 2,5 M users


Usage


  1. Click on Generate to get random colors schemes
  2. Lock your favorite colors by clicking on the lock icon
  3. Click again on Generate to get the remaining colors that match perfectly with them


Other features


  • Add or remove the number of colors from 2 to 10
  • Type your own HEX codes to get matching colors
  • Copy and paste color values or add a palette right into your document


Feel lazy?


Search for millions of ready-made palettes by hue, style and topic.


Want more?


Visit our website on coolors.co for additional features like image palette picker, collage maker, color conversion, gradients and more...


Enjoy!
